Package com.example.fairdraw.DBs

Class AdminDB

java.lang.Object
com.example.fairdraw.DBs.AdminDB
public class AdminDB extends Object
Firestore helper for operations on the "admins" collection.

Provides simple asynchronous CRUD operations and small callback interfaces that callers can implement to receive results.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static interface 
    AdminDB.AddAdminCallback
    Callback for when an Admin is added to the database.
    static interface 
    AdminDB.DeleteAdminCallback
    Callback for when an Admin is deleted from the database.
    static interface 
    AdminDB.GetAdminCallback
     
    static interface 
    AdminDB.UpdateAdminCallback
    Callback for when an Admin is updated in the database.

  • Constructor Details

      public AdminDB()

  • Method Details

    • getAdminCollection

      public static com.google.firebase.firestore.CollectionReference getAdminCollection()
      Returns a reference to the Firestore collection that stores admins.
      Returns:
      CollectionReference pointing to the "admins" collection

    • getAdmin

      public static void getAdmin(String deviceId, AdminDB.GetAdminCallback callback)
      Asynchronously retrieve an Admin document by device id.
      Parameters:
      deviceId - document id (device id) of the admin
      callback - callback to receive the Admin or null on failure

    • addAdmin

      public static void addAdmin(Admin admin, AdminDB.AddAdminCallback callback)
      Add a new Admin document to Firestore.
      Parameters:
      admin - Admin object to persist (its deviceId is used as the document id)
      callback - callback invoked with success flag when the operation completes

    • updateAdmin

      public static void updateAdmin(Admin admin, AdminDB.UpdateAdminCallback callback)
      Update an existing Admin document in Firestore.
      Parameters:
      admin - Admin object containing updated data (document id is admin.getDeviceId())
      callback - callback invoked with success flag when the operation completes

    • deleteAdmin

      public static void deleteAdmin(String deviceId, AdminDB.DeleteAdminCallback callback)
      Delete an Admin document from Firestore by device id.
      Parameters:
      deviceId - document id (device id) to delete
      callback - callback invoked with success flag when the operation completes

    • logNotification

      public static void logNotification(AdminNotificationLog log)
      Writes a single log record to the central 'notification_logs' collection. This is a simple "fire and forget" action with no callback.
      Parameters:
      log - The AdminNotificationLog object to be saved.

    • getNotificationLogsQuery

      public static com.google.firebase.firestore.Query getNotificationLogsQuery()
      Provides a Firestore Query for an admin screen to read all notification logs, sorted with the newest entries first.
      Returns:
      A Query object to be used with a FirestoreRecyclerAdapter or snapshot listener.
